topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0: Prerequisites - Download the Installation Packages (ConRef)

titlealts.searchtitle: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade Installation Prerequisites

body.p: This document is a repository for the download information to be shared among the deployment instructions:
This document describes the prerequisite steps to download the installation files required to install HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade.

section.title: Launch the Software Depot
section.p: Launch the the Software Depot for HP Helion Carrier Grade. You must obtain an HP Passport user account in order to download these files.

ol.li: Click Sign In to log in using your HP Passport account.
After signing in, click the Select button on the right side of the page.
Enter your personal information and address and accept the license agreement and click Next.

For the software you want to download, listed below, select the download method:
Use HPE Download Manager. Use the HPE Download Manager to specify where the installation package will be saved.
Use Standard Download. Use the standard download method for your browser.
For example:
If you selected to use the HPE Download Manager, and this is the first time you have download the HPE Software Depot from the current computer, you will need to install the HPE Download Manager:
In the Open HP_Download_Manager.exe dialog box, click Save As.
Locate and double-click the downloaded HP_Download_Manager.exe file.
Accept the license agreement and click Next to use the wizard to install.

Click the Downloads tab and locate the following download.
HCG 2.0 KVM ESX Ironic VRS. Installation files for the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade Tahoe, Memphis, and Sacramento deployments. This link will download the hcg2_kvm_esx_ironic_vrs.tar.gz file.
Also download the HCG 2.0 KVM ESX Ironic VRS sha256 and HCG 2.0 KVM ESX Ironic VRS sig files.
HPE DCN 3.2R7 files and Patches. Required files for installing HPE DCN 3.2R7 and all of the currently required patches (as of June 3, 2016).
Also download the HCG 2.0 KVM ESX Ironic VRS Part 2 of 2 sha256 and HCG 2.0 KVM ESX Ironic VRS Part 2 of 2 sig files. If you are using HPE DCN 3.2R4, download the HCG 2.0 KVM ESX Ironic VRS Part 2 of 2 to obtain the files for installing the 3.2R4 version of DCN/ This link will download the hcg2_kvm_esx_ironic_vrs_part2of2.tar.gz file. You can also download the HPE DCN 3.2R7 file to get all of the patches you will need to install.

Click the Downloads tab and locate the following download.
HCG 2.0 KVM AVS Installation files for the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade Tahoe, Memphis, and Sacramento deployments. This link will download the hcg2_kvm_avs.tar.gz file.
Also download the HCG 2.0 KVM AVS sha256 and HCG 2.0 KVM AVS sig files.
Optionally download this package to get of the currently required patches (as of June 3, 2016).
Optionally, download the Helion Carrier Grade 2.0 Infoblox Plugin. Also, download the checksum and signature files.

section.p: Note: When downloading installation files, always download and verify the associated checksum and signature files before installing.
Post-install patches; linked to in Post Install page, not pre-reqs

ul.li: Helion Carrier Grade 2.0 Horizon001 Patch002. This link will download the HCG2.0_Horizon001_Patch002.tar.gz file.
Helion Carrier Grade 2.0 Horizon003 Patch031. This link will download the HCG2.0_Horizon003_Patch031.tar.gz file.

section.p: Note: When downloading installation files, always download and verify the signature file before installing.

body.section:
Extract and copy the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade installation files and patches After downloading the hcg2_kvm_esx_ironic_vrs.tar.gz file (using the HCG 2.0 KVM ESX Ironic VRS link, above):
Extract the hcg2_kvm_esx_ironic_vrs.tar.gz file. The extraction creates the hcg2_kvm_esx_ironic_vrs.tar file.
Extract the hcg2_kvm_esx_ironic_vrs_part2of2.tar.gz file. The extraction creates the hcg2_kvm_esx_ironic_part2of2.vrs.tar file.
Extract the hcg2_kvm_esx_ironic_vrs.tar and hcg2_kvm_esx_ironic_part2of2.vrs.tar files. A number of files and folders are extracted.
Copy or move the extracted files as indicated in the following tables.
File Name Copy to location on the Lifecycle Manager Notes
cg-hlm.qcow2
/var/lib/libvirt/images
Can copy this to any other directory and update the group_vars/all file with that dir folder path
cg-hos-misc.tar.gz
cg-hos-src.tar.gz
/root/cg
Create cg folder if not present
cg-infra-src.tar.gz
/root
cg-ironic-deploy-images.tar.gz /root/cg For Sacramento deployments only.
KVM Region Installation filesThe following files for installing the KVM region are in the WR folder in the extracted download package. Extract these files to any location on the sever and make note of the location.
File Name
bootimage_full.iso
HCG2.0GA-guest-SDK.tar.gz
WR-15.09-sample-guest.img
Mandatory patches
The mandatory_patches directory contains:
providernet-tab-missing-in-horizon. This directory contains the Horizon Provider Network Patch patch.
security_patches. This directory contains the Randomize Cobbler Password patch files: cg-hlm-cobbler-random.patch and knc-cobbler-random.patch.
You will be shown during the installation where to copy these patches.
pre-install-patches
The /hcg2_dcn_32r7.tar/hcg2_dcn_32r7/hcg2_dcn_32r7/pre-install-patches/pre-hlinux-patches folder in the HPE DCN 3.2R7 files and Patches download file contains patches that must be installed during the installation process. You will be shown during the installation where to copy these patches.:
pre-hlinux-patches folder
HCG2.0_Accelerate001_Patch023.tar.gz
HCG2.0_BMEndpoint001_Patch024.tar.gz
HCG2.0_ELK001_Patch014.tar.gz
HCG2.0_Heat001_Patch003.tar.gz
HCG2.0_Horizon002_Patch009.tar.gz
HCG2.0_Icinga001_Patch008.tar.gz
HCG2.0_Keystone001_Patch010.tar.gz
HCG2.0_LOG001_Patch013.tar.gz
HCG2.0_RMQ001_Patch012.tar.gz
HCG2.0_Stackrc001_Patch011.tar.gz
neu-dcnr7-predeploy.tar.gz
The directory also contains signature and SHA256 files to verify the download. For more information, see Verify the Downloads.
pre-wr-patches
The /hcg2_dcn_32r7.tar/hcg2_dcn_32r7/hcg2_dcn_32r7/pre-install-patches/pre-wr-patches folder in the HPE DCN 3.2R7 files and Patches download file contains patches that must be installed during the KVM region installation process. You will be shown during the installation where to copy these patches.:
pre-hlinux-patches folder
HCG2.0_WR002_Patch005.tar.gz
HCG2.0_WR003_Patch007.tar.gz
HCG2.0_WR004_Patch017.tar.gz
HCG2.0_WR005_Patch019.tar.gz
HCG2.0_WR006_Patch025.tar.gz
HCG2.0_WR007_Patch027.tar.gz
HCG2.0_WR008_Patch029.tar.gz
HCG2.0_WR009_Patch030.tar.gz
HCG2.0_WR010_Patch032.tar.gz
HCG2.0_WR011_Patch033.tar.gz
vrsg-curl-script
The /hcg2_dcn_32r7.tar/hcg2_dcn_32r7/hcg2_dcn_32r7/vrsg-curl-script/ folder in the HPE DCN 3.2R7 files and Patches download file contains cURL scripts required during installation process. You will be shown during the installation where to copy these patches:
pre-hlinux-patches folder
HCG2.0_WR002_Patch005.tar.gz
HCG2.0_WR003_Patch007.tar.gz
HCG2.0_WR004_Patch017.tar.gz
HCG2.0_WR005_Patch019.tar.gz
HCG2.0_WR006_Patch025.tar.gz
HCG2.0_WR007_Patch027.tar.gz
HCG2.0_WR008_Patch029.tar.gz
HCG2.0_WR009_Patch030.tar.gz
HCG2.0_WR010_Patch032.tar.gz
HCG2.0_WR011_Patch033.tar.gz

section.title: Extract the HPE DCN components
section.p: You will install and configure HP Distributed Cloud Networking (DCN) during the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade installation process. The currently supported version are 3.2R4 and 3.2R7. For more information on HPE DCN, see HPE Distributed Cloud Networking documentation.

ul.li: If you are installing HPE DCN 3.2R7, see Extract the HPE DCN 3.2R7 components below.
If you are installing HPE DCN 3.2R4, see Extract the HPE DCN 3.2R4 components below.

body.section:
Extract the HPE DCN 3.2R7 components
The
download package contains files needed to integrate HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade and HPE DCN 3.2R7.VSD Components
The installation download packages contain files needed to integrate HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade and VSD.
Extract the downloaded files from the /hcg2_dcn_32r7.tar/hcg2_dcn_32r7/hcg2_dcn_32r7/dcn/ directory as indicated in the following table.
File Name To be copied to the lifecycle manager Notes
itoolbox1.ova
You will use this file when installing the VRSvApp later in the installation process. You can leave these files in the download location.
Optional.
TEMPL-CPV9.ova Any location on any server that can be accessed by the VMware vCenter client. Not required for Tahoe
DCN IntegrationsThe the /hcg2_dcn_32r7.tar/hcg2_dcn_32r7/hcg2_dcn_32r7/dcn/ directory contains files needed to integrate HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade and HPE DCN.
Extract the downloaded files as indicated in the following table.
DCN 3.2R7 File Name To be copied to the lifecycle manager Notes
nuage-python-openvswitch_3.2.7-267.1_all.deb
nuage-openvswitch-switch_3.2.7-267.1_amd64.deb
nuage-openvswitch-common_3.2.7-267.1_amd64.deb
nuage-openstack-neutron_2015.1.1859_all.deb
nuagenetlib_2015.1.3.2.7.266_all.deb
vsc_singledisk.qcow2
/root/cg/dcn
Create dcn folder under /root/cg if you don’t have in the lifecycle manager
vsc_singledisk.qcow2
VSD-3.2.7_269-hp.qcow2
VSD-3.2.7_269-hp.ova
/var/lib/libvirt/images
VRS.md5sum
VRS_3.2.7-0267.1_04142016.mf
VRS_3.2.7-0267.1_04142016.ovf
VRS_3.2.7-0267.1_04142016-disk1.vmdk
You will use this file when installing the VRSvApp later in the installation process. You can leave these files in the download location.
Not required for Tahoe

Extract the HPE DCN 3.2R4 components
Extract the downloaded files from the DCN-1 and DCN-2 directories from the hcg2_kvm_esx_ironic_vrs.tar and hcg2_kvm_esx_ironic_vrs_part2of2.tar files.VSD Components
The installation download packages contain files needed to integrate HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade and VSD.
Extract the downloaded files from the DCN-1 and DCN-2 directories as indicated in the following table.
File Name To be copied to the lifecycle manager Notes
itoolbox1.ova
You will use this file when installing the VRSvApp later in the installation process. You can leave these files in the download location.
Optional.
TEMPL-CPV9.ova Any location on any server that can be accessed by the VMware vCenter client. Not required for Tahoe
DCN IntegrationsThe installation download packages contain files needed to integrate HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade and HPE DCN.
Extract the downloaded files from the DCN-1 and DCN-2 directories as indicated in the following table.
File Name To be copied to the lifecycle manager Notes
nuage-metadata-agent_3.2.4-133_all.deb
nuagenetlib_0.0.0-1729-kilo_all.deb
nuage-openstack-neutron_2015.1.1745_all.deb
nuage-openvswitch-common_3.2.6-0b008b5_amd64.deb
nuage-openvswitch-switch_3.2.6-0b008b5_amd64.deb
nuage-python-openvswitch_3.2.6-0b008b5_all.deb
vsc_singledisk.qcow2
/root/cg/dcn
Create dcn folder under /root/cg if you don’t have in the lifecycle manager
vsd.xml
VSD-3.2.4_134-hp.ovaVSD-3.2.4_134-hp.qcow2
/var/lib/libvirt/images
VRS_3.2.6-0b008b5_11252015.ovf
VRS_3.2.6-0b008b5_11252015-disk1.vmdk
You will use this file when installing the VRSvApp later in the installation process. You can leave these files in the download location.
Not required for Tahoe
Also, extract the vsc_singledisk.qcow2 file from the HCG_2.0_DCN001_Patch004.tar.gz file and copy the file to ~/cg/dcn directory. Use this vsc_singledisk.qcow2 file in place of the file in the download package.

section.b: Extract and copy the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade installation files and patches

ol.li: Extract the hcg2_kvm_avs.tar.gz file. The exraction creates the hcg2_kvm_avs.tar file.
Extract the hcg2_kvm_avs.tar.gz file.

Copy or move the extracted files as indicated in the following tables.
KVM Region Installation filesThe following files for installing the KVM region are in the WR folder in the extracted download package. Extract these files to any location on the sever and make note of the location.
File Name
bootimage_avs_only.iso
HCG2.0GA-guest-SDK.tar.gz
WR-15.09-sample-guest.img

section.title: Verify the downloaded signature
section.p: After downloading the installation packages, you should verify the signature of the download. You can use the GPG utility, which is already installed on the lifecycle manager host. Signed by the signature file.

A set of GPG public keys are available on Helion Download Network(HDN) . If you did not download the public keys in the previous section, click the GPG Keys to Verify Signature Files link in HDN to download the GPG-HPCSS-Public-Keys.tar file.

ol.li: Copy the GPG-HPCSS-Public-Keys.tar file to the /root/cg/ directory. You will need to create this directory:mkdir /root/cg/
Extract the file. tar xvf GPG-HPCSS-Public-Keys.tar

Copy the public keys to the lifecycle manager host, extract the keys from the compressed files.
The following keys are included in the download:
Hewlett Packard EnterpriseCompanyRSA(HPCodesigningService)-1.pub
Hewlett Packard EnterpriseCompanyRSA(HPCodesigningService)-2.pub
Hewlett Packard EnterpriseCompanyRSA(HPCodesigningService)-3.pub
Hewlett Packard EnterpriseCompanyRSA(HPCodesigningService)-4.pub
Hewlett Packard EnterpriseCompanyRSA(HPCodesigningService)-5.pub
hpPublicKey.pub
hpPublicKey2048.pub

Execute the following command to import the keys: gpg --import "<filename>"
Where <filename> is the name of the extracted file.
The keys are then imported into the gpgp key share: gpg -\-import hpPublicKey.pub gpg -\-import Hewlett Packard EnterpriseCompanyRSA\(HPCodesigningService\)-1.pub gpg -\-import Hewlett Packard EnterpriseCompanyRSA\(HPCodesigningService\)-2.pub gpg -\-import Hewlett Packard EnterpriseCompanyRSA\(HPCodesigningService\)-3.pub gpg -\-import Hewlett Packard EnterpriseCompanyRSA\(HPCodesigningService\)-4.pub gpg -\-import Hewlett Packard EnterpriseCompanyRSA\(HPCodesigningService\)-5.pub gpg -\-import hpPublicKey2048.pub

Use the following command to view the keys in the key store: gpg -\-list-keys
The key store appears similar to the following:/home/sad/.gnupg/pubring.gpg -\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\- pub 2048R/F7191CB9 2014-12-19 pub 1024D/2689B887 2005-03-11 [expired: 2015-03-09] uid Hewlett Packard Enterprise Company (HPE Codesigning Service) pub 2048R/B1275EA3 2014-11-19 [expires: 2024-11-16] uid Hewlett Packard Enterprise Company RSA (HPE Codesigning Service) - 1 pub 2048R/B564A643 2014-11-19 [expires: 2024-11-16] uid Hewlett Packard Enterprise Company RSA (HPE Codesigning Service) - 2 pub 2048R/FF94BC78 2014-11-19 [expires: 2024-11-16] uid Hewlett Packard Enterprise Company RSA (HPE Codesigning Service) - 3 pub 2048R/BA849975 2014-11-19 [expires: 2024-11-16] uid Hewlett Packard Enterprise Company RSA (HPE Codesigning Service) - 4 pub 2048R/C6978F0C 2014-11-19 [expires: 2024-11-16] uid Hewlett Packard Enterprise Company RSA (HPE Codesigning Service) - 5 pub 2048R/5CE2D476 2012-12-04 [expires: 2022-12-02] uid Hewlett Packard Enterprise Company RSA (HPE Codesigning Service)

Use the following command to verify the signature: gpg --verify ./hcg2_kvm_esx_ironic_vrs.tar.gz.sig ./hcg2_kvm_esx_ironic_vrs.tar.gz.sig
or
gpg --verify ./hcg2_kvm_avs.tar.gz ./hcg2_kvm_avs.tar.gz
The output for the command appears similar to the following. This indicates the signature is verified: Good signature from "Hewlett Packard Enterprise Company RSA (HPE Codesigning Service).gpg: Signature made Tue 08 Sept 2015 12:15:20 PM EDT using RSA key ID C6978F0C gpg: Good signature from "Hewlett Packard Enterprise Company RSA (HPE Codesigning Service) - 5" gpg: WARNING: This key is not certified with a trusted signature! gpg: There is no indication that the signature belongs to the owner. Primary key fingerprint: 2545 62E5 28F9 FE92 B85D 8200 FDF9 8F0C
Perform this verification for each file you downloaded.

section.title: Verify the downloaded checksums
section.p: You should also use a checksum verification tool, such as sha256sum, which should come installed with Ubuntu.

ol.li: Run the checksum tool against the download package:sha256sum <path-to-file>/hcg2_kvm_esx_ironic_vrs.tar

Compare the output of the checksum tool to the download checksum file. sha256sum.exe hcg2_kvm_esx_ironic_vrs.tar 774cf8be645cbd868acd0b2a8de811de86e283b17cbad849c313ef38c1af33f5 hcg2_kvm_esx_ironic_vrs.tar.gzNote that the checksum file contains the date that the file was generated, the checksum string, and the name of the file that was used, similar to the following:Mon Dec 7 12:32:33 PST 2015 774cf8be645cbd868acd0b2a8de811de86e283b17cbad849c313ef38c1af33f5 hcg2_kvm_esx_ironic_vrs.tar.gz

section.title: Verify the downloaded checksums
section.p: You should also use a checksum verification tool, such as sha256sum, which should come installed with Ubuntu.

ol.li: Run the checksum tool against the download package:sha256sum <path-to-file>/hcg2_kvm_avs.tar

Compare the output of the checksum tool to the download checksum file. sha256sum.exe hcg2_kvm_esx_ironic_vrs.tar 4ba8ce74525332ed732ed2d6adeca5692e31ef5ee089074ec25bf0b3d7be1882 hcg2_kvm_avs.tar.gzNote that the checksum file contains the date that the file was generated, the checksum string, and the name of the file that was used, similar to the following:Fri Dec 4 12:22:40 PST 2015 4ba8ce74525332ed732ed2d6adeca5692e31ef5ee089074ec25bf0b3d7be1882 hcg2_kvm_avs.tar.gz

section.p: Download the following Debian packages from a trusted source:
Move the downloaded files to the to the /root/cg/dcn directory on the lifecycle manager host:

body.p: You should have downloaded these files during the prerequisites. If you have not downloaded the patch, launch the Software updates and licensing and locate the patch files and the associated checksum and signature files. You must obtain a user account in order to download these files.

ol.li: Download the following mandatory patches:

ul.li: Helion Carrier Grade 2.0 Heat001 Patch003. This patch addresses a number of issues.
Helion Carrier Grade 2.0 WR002 Patch005.This patch addresses a number of issues in the KVM region.
Helion Carrier Grade 2.0 WR003 Patch007. This patch fixes the PCI Bus Assignment for VM Guest.
HCG2.0_Icinga001_Patch008. This patch creates a random password to log into the Icinga interface.
Helion Carrier Grade 2.0 Keystone001_Patch010. This patch fixes a problem with the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade certificate.
Helion Carrier Grade 2.0 Stackrc001 Patch011 -- Sacramento only. This patch fixes issue where the baremetal service (Ironic) is not able to use the CAN endpoint.
Helion Carrier Grade 2.0 RMQ001 Patch012. This patch fixes a problem with the logging of the RabbitMQ service.
Helion Carrier Grade 2.0 Log001 Patch013. This patch fixes a problem with the RabbitMQ service installed on HP Helion OpenStack CarrierGrade.
Helion Carrier Grade 2.0 ELK001 Patch014. This patch addresses several ELK (ElasticSearch, Logstash, Kibana) related issues.
Helion Carrier Grade 2.0 LOG002 Patch015. This is an optional patch to change the logging of the services from INFO or DEBUG to WARNING.
Helion Carrier Grade 2.0 WR004 Patch017. This patch addresses a number of issues in the KVM region.
Helion Carrier Grade 2.0 DCN003 Patch018. This patch installs a cURL script that can be used to enable floating IP addressing on the VRS-G node.
Helion Carrier Grade 2.0 WR005 Patch019. This patch addresses a number of issues in the KVM region.
Helion Carrier Grade 2.0 Accelerate001 Patch023. This patch resolves the issue Failed to launch the accelerated daemon encountered during the hlm deploy process during installation.
Helion Carrier Grade 2.0 BMEndpoint001 Patch024. This patch resolves the issue with Horizon accessing Baremetal region to updates the creation of a certificate that can be updated in future patches.
Helion Carrier Grade 2.0 WR006 Patch025. This patch addresses a number of issues in the KVM region.
Helion Carrier Grade 2.0 WR007 Patch027. This patch addresses a security issue in the KVM region. Replaces Patch026.
Helion Carrier Grade 2.0 WR008 Patch029. This patch addresses a security issue in the KVM region. Replaces Patch029.
Helion Carrier Grade 2.0 WR009 Patch030. This patch addresses a number of issues in the KVM region.

Helion Carrier Grade 2.0 HCG-OVS001 Patch028. This patch fixes the buffer overflow in openvswitch debian versions 2.2.x through 2.3.x allows for Remot Code Execution, and in 2.4.0 - 2.4.8 allows for Denial of Service and possible RCE.

ol.li: Download the following mandatory patches:

Download the following mandatory patches:
Helion Carrier Grade 2.0 Horizon002 Patch009. This patch fixes a problem that the prevents the user from switching between regions in Horizon. .
